snippet: In response to remarks Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel made to BBC Persian, Iranians took to Twitter to inform him that they do, in fact, wear jeans and listen to Western music.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu's appeal to Iran's young population backfires, as Iranians take to Twitter to inform him that they are, in fact, free to wear jeans and listen to Western music.

byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: In response to remarks Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel made to BBC Persian, Iranians took to Twitter to inform him that they do, in fact, wear jeans and listen to Western music.

headline.main: Netanyahu Dressed Down After Appeal to Iranians
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Dressed Down After Appeal To Iranians
